content: Music is troublesome. It seems that no sooner have you created it, than it in some strange way fades its original spark that was glorified by your mind.
translations: ita:La musica Ã¨ problematica. Sembra che non appena tu l'hai creata, in qualche strano modo sfumi la scintilla originale, ch
